entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:06 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -37.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
